name: Balloon World (micyaggi07)
description:
Instructions

This is Balloon World.

You're a little 5 year old girl called Nana,

she likes to bounce around balloons.

While she is bouncing balloons she travels through the whole world!

You got to keep making her bounce the balloon until she gets home.

                                Controls:          

key left arrow = left                key right arrow = right

Notes & Credits

Credit to @Zinnea for the Pong Game tutorial,

and my dad for this game idea, Nana is my sister too.

This was originally made on Scratch: https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/794984094
